root.name: Who Wants To Be a Millionaire: Party Edition
root.description: OverviewWho Wants To Be a Millionaire: Party Edition is an entry in the Who Wants to be a Millionaire franchise that utilizes the Playstation Buzz controllers. Who Wants To Be a Millionaire: Party Edition was only released in the UK.GameplayWho Wants To Be a Millionaire: Party Edition is a trivia game in which players answer a series of questions in increasing difficulty. There are plateaus that can be reached which will then be the minimum amount the player can win.Who Wants To Be a Millionaire: Party Edition can be used with the regular PlayStation 2 controllers or the Buzz controllers.

similar_games.game: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Special Editions
